text: Goffredo Stabellini (born July 8, 1925 in Formignana, died November 23, 2012) was an Italian professional football player. He played for one season (1946/47, 4 games) in the Serie A for A.S. Roma. ==External links== == References == Category:1925 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:A.S. title: Goffredo Stabellini
